body_content.explanation: a female actor whose voice may be used in different ways, for example, acting in a radio play, speaking in a filmed advertisement, speaking the part of a character in an animated film (= one created from drawings, models, etc.), or speaking the part of another actor in a film that has been dubbed (= the spoken parts have been changed into a different language):
examples: She originally joined the club to learn more about anime and narration to help in becoming a voice actress.
She was a voice actress for the animated comedy Robot Chicken.
